backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing two YouTube‑related UX requirements and the files implementing them.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for all frontend source files, detailing their roles and behaviors.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining light/dark color themes and global layout defaults.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/public/vendor/lame.min.js: Minified lamejs v1.2.0 MP3 encoder library used for client‑side audio encoding.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders ChatScreen.
frontend/src/features/chat/ChatScreen.ts: Main chat UI orchestrating job flow, restricted‑source checks, URL fetching, and conversion tasks with autoscroll handling.
frontend/src/features/chat/components/Ch: Input component for link or file upload with format selection and warnings for restricted sources.
React component displaying a list of conversion jobs with status indicators, or a placeholder when empty.
frontend/src/features/conversion/convert: Utilities to load Lame.js and convert an AudioBuffer to WAV or MP3 with validation and progress handling.
frontend/src/features/conversion/fetchVi: Fetches a video file from a URL with validation, restricted-source checks, and filename extraction.
frontend/src/features/conversion/restric: Detects restricted sources like YouTube or TikTok and provides corresponding error or warning messages.
frontend/src/features/conversion/useConv: React Query mutation hook that wraps video-to-audio conversion and returns the result.
frontend/src/features/conversion/videoVa: Validates whether a Blob is a video by checking signatures or loading it in a temporary video element.
frontend/src/features/jobs/types.ts: Defines ConversionJob structure and status types for tracking video conversion tasks.
frontend/src/features/jobs/useJobHistory: Manages a list of conversion jobs with functions to add and update them.
frontend/src/features/validation/urlVali: Provides URL validation and normalization utilities enforcing HTTP/HTTPS formats.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
Hook that updates a CSS variable with the current viewport height to handle mobile browser UI changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useChatAutoScroll.ts: React hook that tracks whether a scroll container is near the bottom and auto-scrolls when new content arrives. Exposes ref, scroll handler, and manual scroll-to-bottom function.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context for Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, handling login, stored identity loading, and login state tracking. Includes a provider and hook for accessing identity-related actions and status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder module exporting nothing, as backend methods are not used.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining color themes, dark mode, layout behavior, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loading global styles.
frontend/src/types/vendor-lame.d.ts: TypeScript declarations for the lamejs MP3 encoder and optional window.lamejs exposure.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom theme extensions using CSS variables, plugins, and responsive container settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing goals, known issues, features, and architectural notes for a video-to-audio conversion app.
